Usage: anyrepo status [OPTIONS]

  Run 'git status' on projects.

  This command behaves identical to `anyrepo foreach -- git status`.

Options:
  -P, --project DIRECTORY  Project path to operate on only. All by default.
                           This option can be specified multiple times.
  -M, --manifest FILE      Manifest file. Initial clone/init settings by
                           default.
  -G, --groups TEXT        Group Filtering. TODO: more details. Initial
                           clone/init filter settings by default.
  -s, --short
  -h, --help               Show this message and exit.
